text: Rahime Atabay (born September 25, 1995) is a Turkish women's football defender currently playing in the Women's Third League for 1955 Batman Belediyespor with jersey number 18. ==Career== ===Club=== Rahine Atabay obtained her license from Konak Belediyespor in İzmir on May 29, 2009. She has been playing since then in the same club. She debuted at the 2016–17 UEFA Women's Champions League qualifying round Group 9 match against Hibernians F.C.. In the 2016–17 season, she transferred to Osmaniye Demirspor, who play in the Turkish Women's Second Football League. In the second half of the 2017–18 Women's Second League season, she joined Hakkarigücü Spor, and enjoyed her new team's promotion to the Women's First League at the end of the season. After the first half of the 2018–19 Women's First League season, she moved to 1955 Batman Belediyespor to play in the Women's Third League. ==Career statistics== . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|National !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=4 |Konak Belediyespor |2011–12 |First League |1 ||0 || – || – ||- ||- ||1 ||0 |- |2014–15 |First League |1 ||0 ||- ||- ||- ||- ||1 ||0 |- |2015–16 |First League |6 ||1 ||1 ||0 ||- ||- ||7 ||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !8 !!1 !!1 !!0 !!- !!- !!9 !!1 |- |rowspan=3 |Osmaniye Demirspor |2016–17 |Second League |9 ||0 ||- ||- ||- ||- ||9 ||0 |- |2017–18 |Second League |7 ||1 ||- ||- ||- ||- ||7 ||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !16 !!1 !!- !!- !!- !!- !!16 !!1 |- |rowspan=3 |Hakkarigücü Spor |2017–18 |Second League |10 ||3 ||- ||- ||- ||- ||10 ||3 |- |2018–19 |First League |8 ||1 ||- ||- ||- ||- ||8 ||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !18 !!4 !!- !!- !!- !!- !!18 !!4 |- |rowspan=2 |1955 Batman Belediyespor |2018–19 |Third League |1 ||0 ||- ||- ||- ||- ||1 ||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !1 !!0 !!- !!- !!- !!- !!1 !!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !43 !!0 !!1 !!0 !!- !!- !!44 !!6 |} ==Honours== ; Turkish Women's First Football League :; Konak Belediyespor :: Winners (2): 2014–15, 2015–16 ;Turkish Women's Second Football League :; Hakkarigücü Spor :: Winners (1): 2017–18 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:People from Nusaybin Category:Turkish women's footballers Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Konak Belediyespor players Category:Hakkarigücü Spor players
